background: Guides long-form documentary and factual programming at ČT. Seeks projects with strong Czech identity and societal impact, often supporting European co-productions.
thematic_priorities: Arts and culture with Czech or European lens
content_not_wanted: Light entertainment formats without civic value
target_audience: Broad Czech audience with interest in history, society and culture
budget_parameters: Range: CZK 150K–500K per hour Higher for international co-productions
current_calls: European co-pros with strong public value
submission_process: Synopsis with topic, structure and public value
name: Jan Maxa
